long_description: Nature's elements and electronics don't mix. The E-Case eSeries(TM) 20 Case safeguards multiple devices, cables, chargers and valuables while allowing full use of device features and controls. Ultra-clear urethane windows allow full use of touch screens, cameras and audio functions. Every case is individually tested to meet IPX7 standard of withstanding submersion in 1m of water for 30 min. 1-step, waterproof SealLock(TM) zipper and rugged RF-welded seams guarantee protection from the elements. PVC-free materials. E-Case eSeries 20 Case has die-cut lash points for tethering. Fits Samsung Galaxy Note(R) 10.1, Galaxy Tab(R) 3 10.1, Motorola Xoom(TM) and other 10 in. tablets. Closeout.
short_description: Nature's elements and electronics don't mix. The E-Case eSeries(TM) 20 Case safeguards multiple devices, cables, chargers and valuables while allowing full use of device features and controls.
